panels.description: Intro and summary of this dashboard

options.content:
# **Welcome to the LibreChat Exporter Dashboard**

This dashboard provides insights into key LibreChat metrics including users, conversations, tokens, transactions, and more. The queries are calculated over the currently selected time range (e.g. last 24 hours).

panels.title: Dashboard Overview

panels.description: Displays the number of active users over time (metric: librechat_active_users).
panels.title: LibreChat Active Users (Last 24h)

panels.description:
Users Last 7days - rolling window with unique users that logged in and has a message in the last 7days
Users Last 30days - rolling window with unique users that logged in and has a message in the last 30days
Unique Users with messages - All time users with at least 1 message.
panels.title: Users Details

panels.description: This is a WIP. Label domain is getting replaced. Talk with CNPT
panels.title: User Count by Domain

panels.description: Counts of total users, agents, assistants, keys.
panels.title: Users & Agents

panels.description: Totals for conversations, tags, sessions, projects, and shared links.
panels.title: Conversations & Sessions

panels.description: Totals for prompts, prompt groups, and presets.
panels.title: Prompts & Presets

panels.description: Totals for files, banners, and active banners.
panels.title: Files & Banners & Transactions

panels.description: Totals for transactions and cost-related metrics (note: token count is now separated into its own section).
panels.title: Cost Metrics (Total)

panels.description: Totals for messages, tool calls, plugin auth, and actions (all are now gauges).
panels.title: Messages & Tools (Total)

panels.description: Message stats: total tokens, average tokens, error messages, attachments, and plugin usage. All are now gauge values or direct percentages.
panels.title: Message Metrics

panels.description: Total and average file sizes (in bytes).
panels.title: File Size Metrics

panels.description: Total number of distinct deployed model names (metric: librechat_deployed_model_names_count).
panels.title: Total Deployed Model Names

panels.description: Usage count for each deployed model, agent, and assistant (metrics: librechat_model_usage_count, librechat_agent_usage_count, librechat_assistant_usage_count).
panels.title: Deployed Model, Agent & Assistants Usage Count

panels.description: Distribution (usage count) for each agent (metric: librechat_agent_usage_count).
panels.title: Agent and Assistants Usage Count

panels.description: Distribution of user providers (metric: librechat_user_provider_count).
panels.title: User Provider Count

panels.description: Average session duration in seconds (librechat_session_avg_duration).
panels.title: Session Avg Duration

panels.description: Average number of generations per prompt group (librechat_prompt_group_generations_avg).
panels.title: Prompt Group Generations (Avg)

panels.description: Breakdown of actions grouped by type over the selected time range (metric: librechat_action_count_by_type).
panels.title: Action Count by Type

panels.description: Breakdown of prompts grouped by type over the selected time range (metric: librechat_prompt_count_by_type).
panels.title: Prompt Count by Type

panels.description: Counts of tool calls by toolId.
panels.title: Tool Call Count by Tool

panels.description: Average messages per conversation.
panels.title: Avg Messages per Conversation (Over Time)

panels.description: This gauge displays the cost metrics broken down by token type (sum and average).
panels.title: Transaction Cost by Token Type

panels.description: üî¢ Transaction Token Metrics
panels.title: Transaction Token Sum

panels.description: üî¢ Transaction Token Metrics
panels.title: Transaction Token Average

panels.description: This panel shows total transaction cost (USD), transaction count, balance count, and cost per user.
panels.title: Transactions & Cost Metrics (Total)

panels.description: Transaction cost (USD) per deployed model, aggregated over the selected time range.
panels.title: Transaction Cost per Model
